answers.author: Margaret Motheral
answers.text:
Hi,  I'm the poster child for the worst in brownfield development in Philadelphia.  I have a lot of research, but the topic would be how doing it wrong makes negative impact and destroys health and neighbors lives.  It's more of an Environmental Justice issue and an example of the wrong way to do it and the results.  Much can be learned from that.

Go to the California Redevelopment Association website for numerous Brownfield examples.  http://www.calredevelop.org/tools/brownfields.aspx

author: Danielle Goodwin
text: As an Urban Planning student currently working on the National Brownfields 2011 conference I was curious if anyone knew of a case study that has been done on a revitalized Brownfield? Specifically, I am looking for a case study or studies that reveal how a revitalized Brownfield can positively impact the community it serves both physically and economically. Please post responses directly to the website.
title: Brownfield Case Study
